description: Regularly updated database containing all ISIN codes and details issued in India in CSV format
name: india-isin-data

resources.description: Indian ISINs for Company, Statuatory Corporation, Banking Company. These are ISINs starting with INE.
resources.name: india-isin-ine

fields.example: ITI MUTUAL FUND LIQUID FUND REG GROWTH
fields.name: Description
fields.title: ISIN Description

fields.description: Name of the issuer that issued this security
fields.name: Issuer
fields.title: Name of the Issuer

fields.description: Description of the type of security
fields.name: Type
fields.title: Security Type

fields.description: ISIN Status (such as Deleted, Active, Suspended)
fields.name: Status
fields.title: Security Status
